div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 569px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1637px; margin-left: 76px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: "Adobe Clean"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ededed); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1003px; margin-left: 365px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: "Adobe Clean"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 660px; height: 1px; padding-top: 721px; margin-left: 30px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: "Adobe Clean"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ededed); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Is the indexer configured
as "update on save"?

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 718px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1243px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: "Adobe Clean"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ededed); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
A MySQL trigger (Magento\Framework\MView)
adds IDs of the changed data to a changelog
table and the index status stays the same,
including the status "valid".

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
